title: Sin: Nanatsu no Taizai
alternative_title: The 7 Deadly Sins, sin 七つの大罪
description: You, will you be a worshipper of the devil lords? These beautiful lords lead humans to the seven deadly sins: pride, envy, wrath, sloth, greed, gluttony, and lust. A revealing fantasy that craves to corruption and happiness starts now.
